values.text: Alright, here are two examples:

Instead of: "I already filed a ticket. I checked it yesterday. When will it be resolved?"
Write: "When is my ticket status for ABC12345?"

Instead of: "device"
Write: "I want to order a device"
Let's get started! Try ask me a question.
Let's get started! How can I help you today?
Alright. Is there anything else that I can help you with?
I am glad that helps. Do you have any other questions?
The Intelligent Hub app is your single destination that gives you access to your organization's apps, people search and corporate resources.
Do you have other questions related to Intelligent Hub?
Hi $firstName, I am your Hub Assistant. I am here to help you with your IT needs.
So, what can I help you with today?
Hi $firstName! I am your Hub Assistant. How can I help you today?
Sorry, I don't understand.
Sorry, can we try again?
Sorry, can you rephrase your question?
You can learn more in this FAQ: https://www.vmware.com/content/dam/digitalmarketing/vmware/en/pdf/products/workspace-one/vmware-workspace-one-intelligent-hub-faq.pdf
Or, visit our website: https://www.vmware.com/products/workspace-one.html

I am sure you can find your answer for "<? input.text ?>" online. I am designed to help you with your IT needs such as ordering a device or filing a ticket.
